definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Why does the Assistant Manager need to check the pigeon whole?
sentences.chinese: 为什么大堂副理需要核实整个文件架？

sentences.english: If you need help, please contact with assistant manager directly.
sentences.chinese: 您如需帮助，请直接与大堂副理联系。

sentences.english: Assistant Manager must be on duty at least 20 minutes earlier.
sentences.chinese: 大堂副理必须至少提前20分钟上班。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, sir. I will inform the Assistant Manager, so he will contact you as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 先生，对不起，我会通知大堂副理就此事和您联络。

sentences.english: He is a concierge at a five-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个五星级饭店的大厅副理。

sentences.english: Would you like to Mr. Wong, our Assistant Manager ?
sentences.chinese: 您需要与我们大堂副理王先生谈一谈吗？

sentences.english: Why do I need to call the Assistant Manager for help if I have a problem?
sentences.chinese: 在遇到问题时，为什么需要找大堂副理帮助？

sentences.english: The Assistant Manager is at your service 24 hours everyday.
sentences.chinese: 大堂副理每天24小时为您服务。

sentences.english: I hope I can make a good assistant manager sometime in the future.
sentences.chinese: 我希望将来能够成为一名合格的大堂副理。

sentences.english: Is the Assistant Manager always is the first person I should call for help?
sentences.chinese: 大堂副理是我在寻求帮助时，要找的第一人吗？

sentences.english: All the registration cards need to be checked and initialed by Assistant Manager.
sentences.chinese: 所有的登记卡都应由大堂副理检查及签名。

definition: student who also works part-time/(old) reform-school student
to do things in a strictly businesslike manner (idiom)
to be transferred to another post/to post away
variant of 保鏢|保镖[bao3 biao1]
tally for going through a pass
to receive blessings in a sincere spirit
to set apart/to assign sb to a job
